text:
One of the best open parks that u can find that fits for the whole family.

From young kids play area to teens, adults and even seniors. It really lives up to its name of being an Activity Park. Let us just give some examples of what u can find here.

-Mini Track for kids
-Basketball Court
-Basketball Drill Area
-4 swings
-Playground
-Walk/jog path
-Exercise Devices
-Community Garden
And more..

This place is a definitely the place to go as you can plan your weekly activities for the family and friends without headache.

Cheers!

#serangoonnorth #serangoon #activitypark #basketballcourt #exercise #allinone #communitygarden #vivo #v15pro #piquedwanderer #famwithsten
Nice park with fitness equipment, playground, community garden and several shelters.
